modules.name: Content Quality
modules.description: Evaluates depth, accuracy, and comprehensiveness of content
insights: Content is relatively new and needs more depth
Some pages are too short (under 800 words)
Limited case studies and examples

issues.message: 12 pages are under 800 words and lack depth
Limited use of examples and case studies

recommendations.title: Expand short content pages
recommendations.description: Add more depth and detail to 12 pages currently under 800 words
actionItems: Research and add detailed explanations to short pages
Include examples, case studies, and practical applications
Aim for minimum 1,200 words per page
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 10-15 point increase in Content Quality score

modules.name: E-E-A-T Signals
modules.description: Expertise, Experience, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness indicators
insights: Author bylines missing on 60% of content
Limited author profiles and credentials
New brand with limited industry recognition

issues.message: 60% of content pages lack author attribution

recommendations.title: Add author bylines to all content
recommendations.description: Create author profiles and add bylines to all 25 pages
actionItems: Create detailed author bio pages
Add author bylines to all content pages
Include credentials and expertise areas
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 12-18 point increase in E-E-A-T score

modules.name: Technical SEO
modules.description: Site structure, performance, and technical implementation
insights: Basic technical setup is in place
Some performance optimization needed
Schema markup partially implemented

issues.message: Missing schema markup on product pages

recommendations.title: Implement comprehensive schema markup
recommendations.description: Add schema markup to all product and service pages
actionItems: Add Product schema to 15 product pages
Implement Organization schema on homepage
Add Article schema to blog posts
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 8-12 point increase in Technical SEO score

modules.name: AI Readability
modules.description: How well content is structured for AI search engines
insights: Content structure needs improvement
Limited use of structured data
Headings could be more descriptive

recommendations.title: Improve content structure and headings
recommendations.description: Standardize heading hierarchy and improve content structure
actionItems: Review and fix heading structure on 20 pages
Ensure proper H1-H6 hierarchy
Add descriptive subheadings
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 6-10 point increase in AI Readability score

modules.name: Link Profile
modules.description: Quality and relevance of inbound and internal links
insights: Limited backlinks from authoritative sources
Some orphaned pages without internal links
New domain with limited link equity

issues.message: 18 pages have no internal inbound links

recommendations.title: Fix orphaned pages and build backlinks
recommendations.description: Add internal links to orphaned pages and develop backlink strategy
actionItems: Add internal links to 18 orphaned pages
Develop content marketing strategy for backlinks
Reach out to industry publications for mentions
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 10-15 point increase in Link Profile score over 3-6 months

modules.name: User Intent Alignment
modules.description: How well content matches search intent and user queries
insights: Some content aligns well with user intent
Some pages target keywords with mismatched intent
Content depth varies significantly

issues.message: 10 pages have intent mismatch with target keywords

recommendations.title: Align content with search intent
recommendations.description: Review and update 10 pages to better match user search intent
actionItems: Analyze search intent for target keywords
Update content to match intent (informational/transactional)
Add appropriate CTAs based on intent
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 8-12 point increase in User Intent Alignment score

modules.name: Brand Signals
modules.description: Brand mentions, citations, and online presence
insights: Limited brand mentions across the web
New brand with minimal online presence
Inconsistent brand messaging

issues.message: Very limited brand citations and mentions

recommendations.title: Build brand presence and citations
actionItems: Create brand profiles on industry directories
Develop PR strategy for brand mentions
Build relationships with industry publications
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 15-20 point increase in Brand Signals score over 6-12 months
